creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Created attachment 30394
Test plan used against tomcat

Not sure that true.
If your make a parallel test (2 Thread groups) the number of requests are (practically) the same.

Please note, I've ran this test with a remote tomcat. Seems be a better environment to evaluate JMeter performance.
